title: Harakiri 1962 BRRip Sonata Premiere
description:
Following the collapse of his clan, an unemployed samurai (Tatsuya Nakadai) arrives at the manor of Lord Iyi, begging to be allowed to commit ritual suicide on the property. Iyiâ€™s clansmen, believing the desperate ronin is merely angling for a new position, try to force his hand and get him to eviscerate himselfâ€”but they have underestimated his beliefs and his personal brand of honor. Winner of the Cannes Film Festivalâ€™s Special Jury Prize, Harakiri, directed by Masaki Kobayashi is a fierce evocation of individual agency in the face of a corrupt and hypocritical system.
